description:
Job Title: Director of Business Development & Growth

Reports to: CEO/Founder

Direct Reports: None at this time

Location: Remote/Large Midwest City

Company Profile

MyTalentPlanner is a Platform as a Service (PaaS) company that provides organizations the ability to dominate their industry with the right people and strategy. We have all these plans in place in our business (marketing plan) and life (health insurance plan) but how come we don’t put a talent plan in place in our organization. MyTalentPlanner provides our unique talent planning process and software to Small to Medium-Sized Businesses (SMBs), as well as other consultants to use with their clients. MyTalentPlanner is the only platform for SMBs that integrates their strategy, talent and execution plans all in one place accessible from any place.

MyTalentPlanner is staged for significant growth and wants to add a Business Development Manager to our team that is focused on increasing revenue. The Business Development Manager will be rewarded for increasing users on the software through salary, aggressive commission plan and company stock.

This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity for an individual who is wants to be part of a cohesive team, change the industry, increasing responsibility control your own destiny

What You Can Expect from Us

● Salary with commissions based on new sales

● Company ownership/Employee stock ownership

● 401k with 3% match

● Vacation

● Total person development plan

● Advancement and leadership opportunities

Key Accountabilities for Business Development Manager

· These key accountabilities are ranked in order of importance and include the % of time in a week/month that the Business Development Manager will spend on each key accountability.

1. New Business Development/Increase Revenue (60% of time) – Add new consultants (TPAs) and SMB companies to MyTalentPlanner through a consultative sales approach.

2. Sales Strategy (20% of time) – Develop a proactive sales strategy that achieves budgeted sales with our target markets

3. CRM/Database Management (5% of time) -Consistently use CRM software to fill the sales pipeline by tracking, monitoring, communicating with and close active leads.

4. Team Member (10% of time) – Be a contributing Revenue Team Member by providing insight and ideas to achieve monthly reoccurring revenue (MRR) goals.

5. Market Intelligence (5% of time) –Collect and distribute market and competitive intelligence/be the eyes and ears of the organization in the field.

· Lead the sales strategy and execution of the company to achieve revenue goals

· Proactive in bringing forward creative and unique sales ideas

· Optimistic/Inspires others to the vision of MyTalentPlanner

· Is passionate about helping companies grow their people and organization.

· Self-starter – Works independently with a sense of urgency

· Interpersonal skills

· Personal accountability

· Self-management

· Teamwork

Requirements

· Education

o 4-year degree in business related field

· Experience

o 3+ years of successful business-to business sales experience required

o Experience selling SMB or HR leaders

o CRM system experience a plus

o SaaS sales experience a plus

Measures of Performance (vs. Budget)

· MRR = Monthly Reoccurring Revenue vs. budget

· ARR – Annual Reoccurring Revenue vs. budget

· Sales Pipeline

· # of Talent Planning Advisors

· # of Companies/Users

NOTE: This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employee may perform other related duties as assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance
• Paid time off
• Vision insurance

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote
